ModMetaData.name: Clueless Arrivals
ModMetaData.author: frame
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a new industrial player faction that starts without any predefined research.
Start a new game to enable: New Colony > Scenario Editor > Edit mode: Change Player faction to "Clueless Arrivals"
Note: Special events that target the normal vanilla New Arrivals faction won't be triggered, like say for example the wanderer event.
